items.content_html: Ngx-Bottom-Sheet is a highly customizable and lightweight Angular service that provides a mobile-friendly bottom sheet component. Originally designed for Progressive Web Apps (PWA) and mobile-first applications, this component can be used seamlessly in desktop environments as well.
items.title: ArslanAmeer/ngx-bottom-sheet: Ngx-Bottom-Sheet is a highly customizable and lightweight Angular service that provides a mobile-friendly bottom sheet component. Originally designed for Progressive Web Apps (PWA) and mobile-first applications, this component can be used seamlessly in desktop environments as well.
